name: Huny
description: Zolar is a new Free-to-Play, Play-to-Earn blockchain-based game centered around unique NFTs (Metazoa) which can be used to explore the endless expanse of Zolar. Players can participate in a variety of exciting missions to uncover hidden treasures (and dangers), which can later be used to upgrade and customize their Metazoa in future. The Zolarverse (Zolar Metaverse) is fueled by an extremely valuable resource, liquid gold, $HUNY. Known uses of $HUNY include the strengthening of players' armies through summoning of new Gen 1â€“3 Metazoa, earning liquidity rewards in the Magic Hive, powering up players' Metazoa, and most importantly, controlling the fate of the Zolarverse.
